for _ in range(int(input())):
    (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    ans = 0
    if abs(x) == abs(y):
        ans = abs(x) * 2
    elif abs(y) > abs(x):
        s = abs(y) - abs(x)
        ans += s
        if s % 2 == 0:
            s //= 2
            ans += (abs(y) - s) * 2
        else:
            s //= 2
            s += 1
            ans += (abs(y) - s) * 2
    else:
        s = abs(x) - abs(y)
        ans += s
        s //= 2
        ans += (abs(x) - s) * 2
    print(ans)
